title: Fork, 1994-66-52, ca. 1905–10
markings: On reverse of shaft, stamped: mark of .833 silver fineness and "VKu" for JM van Kempen & Sons.
description: Four tines with outer two curving outwards and bowl formed as diamond with interected diamond cut-out in center and outlined by double row of stippling. Join with three horizontal bands, straight shaft (with three horizontal bands) widening to form handle with three horizontal lines and pointed end with double stippled pentagonal outline.

participants.person_name: J.M. van Kempen and Son, Voorschoten

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
Structure of Style:  Dutch Modernism in the Applied Arts 1880-1930 [The]
